alert.note: Alert for Laurens; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 9:21PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Laurens, southeastern Greenville and south central Spartanburg Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 920 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles north of Laurens, or near Gray Court, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Laurens, Clinton, Gray Court, Enoree, Ora and Hickory Tavern. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
